segments.text: I notice the angled view of this busy kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink area's a disaster with water overflowing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's absorbed in her dish towel routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems content, unaware of the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's widening, soaking the cabinet fronts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the other side, the upper cabinets are swung open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar's right there, tempting the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances on that shaky stool, reaching in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's using a plate to steady himself or catch crumbs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's cooperating, hand out for her portion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their little adventure is adorable but so dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window overlooks a tidy path with plants.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's calming to see the garden's order.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet inside, the risks make me anxious for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom's neutrality to it all is almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR
